Articles.Content:
I've been trying to use Kustom Kerbals in 1.7.2. My goal is to make Kerbals representing NASA astronauts.

There's just one problem, though: Kustom Kerbals hasn't been updated since 1.2.2. I downloaded a version recompiled for 1.4-ish off GitHub.

Both versions have various errors: the 1.2.2 version doesn't create a Kerbal no matter how many times I press the spawn button, and the 1.4 version will spawn a Kerbal, but with a random name (I tried to spawn Alan Shepard, but all I got was a warning saying he already existed, and it instead spawned a Kerbal with the Kerman surname).

Does anyone know how to get Kustom Kerbals to work with 1.7.2? Or am I just gonna have to go through the process of recruiting Kerbals, closing the game, and renaming them in the files? Because my install has so many mods that loading takes upwards of eight minutes.

EDIT: Disregard this thread. Turns out what I thought I downloaded wasn't truly Kustom Kerbals. It's working fine now.

Edited July 3, 2019 by BNSF1995
